decision_conditions: An EIA is not required for the proposed development. Whist it is acknowledged that the proposal would fall within table schedule 2 Column 1 3(a) Industrial installations for the production of electricity, steam and hot water (unless included in Schedule 1) of the The Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 and would have a site area of more than 0.5 of hectare the proposal would not trigger any significant effects outlined by schedule 3 of the regs and as such the proposal is not likely to have significant effects on the environmentNotwithstanding the above, given the Biodiversity interests of the site any future proposal must be supported by robust and detailed information with particular regards protected species bats and great crested newts of which activity of these species has been recorded in the vicinity of the site and adjacent and nearby Sites of Importance for Nature Conservation (SNIC).
